name: 123 Kids Fun BABY TUNES - Educational Music Games
name_original: 123 Kids Fun BABY TUNES - Educational Music Games
description:
Beautiful and simple music game for toddlers and preschool kids, which inspires and encourages kids to create own music. Great introduction to explore the world of music and sounds.

123 Kids Fun BABY TUNES - not only fun listening, playing, music and sounds but also...

* how certain objects can be used,
* how to recognize the sounds and behaviors of animals while they are - being fed or washed,
* how to recognizes the sounds of instruments,
* how a remote control or a computer mouse is used,
* and much, much more.

The interface is so easy to use that even a 9 month old baby will delight in using this app. Ideal for ages 0 to 6.

+++ CATEGORIES +++

* The countryside;
* Instruments.
* The kitchen;
* The office; 
* Toys; 

In addition to this, your child will have fun with the 123 Kids Fun BABY TUNES’ DRAWING section.

+++ OVERALL FEATURES +++

* Effective learning tool for young kids.
* Hundreds of bright, colorful and memorable sounds and illustrations.
* Simple and intuitive menus, navigation and gameplay.
* Developed and reviewed by experts in preschool education
* Aligned to Common Core Standards for Preschool and Kindergarten Education
* A rich, exploratory environment filled with surprises
* Funny, bright and creative artwork
* Your toddlers, preschoolers can interact with the app at their own pace

123 Kids Fun Baby Tunes - Musical toy for babies and toddlers developed by an award-winning educational studio. The game features activities that foster children’s creativity, motor skills, and appreciation of sounds and music.

123 Kids Fun Baby Tunes was extensively tested with preschool children to ensure its design is as simple as possible and kids can explore the application independently. We hope your kids will love it!
